00040 /**
00041  * @file
00042  *
00043  * Header file for the event Profiler.
00044  *
00045  */
00046 
00047 #ifndef __CVMX_PROFILER_H__
00048 #define __CVMX_PROFILER_H__
00049 
00050 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00051 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00052 extern "C" {
00053 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00054 #endif
00055 
00056 #define EVENT_PERCPU_BUFFER_SIZE    8192
00057 #define PADBYTES            24
00058 
00059 #define EVENT_BUFFER_BLOCK      "event_block"
00060 #define EVENT_BUFFER_SIZE       EVENT_PERCPU_BUFFER_SIZE * (cvmx_octeon_num_cores() + 1)
00061 
00062 #define EVENT_BUFFER_CONFIG_BLOCK   "event_config_block"
00063 #define EBC_BLOCK_SIZE          256
00064 
00065 typedef struct {
00066     int core;
00067     uint32_t pc;
00068 } cvmx_sample_entry_t;
00069 
00070 typedef struct cpu_event_block {
00071     int size;
00072     int sample_read;
00073     int64_t max_samples;
00074     int64_t sample_count;
00075     char *head;
00076     char *tail;
00077     char *end;
00078     char *data;
00079 } cvmx_cpu_event_block_t;
00080 
00081 typedef struct {
00082     cvmx_cpu_event_block_t pcpu_blk_info;
00083     char *pcpu_data;
00084 } cvmx_ringbuf_t;
00085 
00086 typedef struct config_block {
00087     int64_t sample_count;
00088     uint64_t events;
00089     char *pcpu_base_addr[CVMX_MAX_CORES];
00090 } cvmx_config_block_t;
00091 
00092 typedef struct event_counter_control_block {
00093     int32_t read_cfg_blk;
00094     char *config_blk_base_addr;
00095     cvmx_config_block_t cfg_blk;
00096 } event_counter_control_block_t;
00097 
00098 extern void cvmx_update_perfcnt_irq(void);
00099 extern void cvmx_collect_sample(void);
00100 
00101 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00102 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00103 }

00105 #endif
00106 #endif /*  __CVMX_PROFILER_H__ */
